item.title: Alexa : Build me a skill
item.description: The other day I was asked to look in to how we could build an Alexa skill that interacted with an onsite service. I figured this would make a nice blog post. Creating A Skill First things first, head over to the Alexa developer page and sign up for an account. Once in the console, we will create a skill. For my project, I went with an ‘Alexa-Host (Python)’ skill.
